title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: Successful Raids on Hezbollah Terror Cells and Launch Sites in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Within a few hours: The IDF attacked another terrorist cell that was identified entering a military building of the Hezbollah terror organization in southern Lebanon.

Troops of Unit 869 identified earlier today terrorists entering a military building in the Al-Adaysseh area, a short time after the identification, fighter jets attacked the building where the terrorists were located.

A short time ago, Air Force fighter jets attacked a launcher of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the area of Ayta ash-Shab, from which launches were identified towards the Biranit area during the day.

During the day, several launches were identified from Lebanese territory towards various areas in the north of the country.
As a result of a launch that fell in the Biranit area, an IDF soldier was lightly injured and evacuated for medical treatment, his family has been updated.
IDF forces attacked the shooting sources.

Attached is documentation on the subject: https://bit.ly/44Sb60g
